1125920.name: Forged
1125920.description:
Forged is a PvP and PvE arena battler. With diverse influences ranging from Slay the Spire and Returnal to Clash Royale and Warcraft 3, Forged offers players short fast paced 5 minute matches against their friends, or against different bot heroes. Play in VR or desktop with native cross play.

Pick from a wide selection of unique and well balanced units to fight by your side - and bring them to fight when and where you want with the aid of Forged's summoning sphere mechanic.
As games progress, heroes become more powerful, unit interactions become more complicated, and games finish in a flurried rush to destroy the enemies base.

Our planned release is a series of closed Betas through January and February, an open Beta in late February and perhaps early March, and then later this year, Early Access.

Early Access will include:
-Working PvP multiplayer, in VR or non-VR game modes.
-Play as two different heroes from day 1 - Kodo, of the Dekarians, and Qadira, of the Anurans.
-PvBots as either the Anurans or Dekarian forces.
-No campaign mode.
-Temporary sound effects, and some temporary art assets though all units etc are fully complete.
-Temporary voice acting.

The full game will include:
-Multiplayer, with a choice of 3 heroes for each side.
-Voice acting with real professional voice actors.
-Less bugs.
-Working co-op PvE.
-More arenas.
-A short single player campaign for the Anuran forces.
